name: API-only XSS
description: Perform a persisted XSS attack with <iframe src="javascript:alert(`xss`)"> without using the frontend application at all. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Access Log
description: Gain access to any access log file of the server. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Admin Registration
description: Register as a user with administrator privileges. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Admin Section
description: Access the administration section of the store. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Bjoern's Favorite Pet
description: Reset the password of Bjoern's OWASP account via the Forgot Password mechanism with the original answer to his security question. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Blockchain Hype
description: Learn about the Token Sale before its official announcement. (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: CAPTCHA Bypass
description: Submit 10 or more customer feedbacks within 10 seconds. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Change Bender's Password
description: Change Bender's password into slurmCl4ssic without using SQL Injection or Forgot Password. (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Christmas Special
description: Order the Christmas special offer of 2014. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Classic Stored XSS
description: Perform an XSS attack with <script>alert(`xss`)</script> on a legacy page within the application. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Client-side XSS Protection
description: Perform a persisted XSS attack with <iframe src="javascript:alert(`xss`)"> bypassing a client-side security mechanism. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Confidential Document
description: Access a confidential document. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: DOM XSS
description: Perform a DOM XSS attack with <iframe src="javascript:alert(`xss`)">. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Database Schema
description: Exfiltrate the entire DB schema definition via SQL Injection. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Deprecated Interface
description: Use a deprecated B2B interface that was not properly shut down. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Easter Egg
description: Find the hidden easter egg. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Email Leak
description: Perform an unwanted information disclosure by accessing data cross-domain. (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Ephemeral Accountant
description: Log in with the (non-existing) accountant acc0unt4nt@juice-sh.op without ever registering that user. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Error Handling
description: Provoke an error that is neither very gracefully nor consistently handled. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Expired Coupon
description: Successfully redeem an expired campaign coupon code. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Five-Star Feedback
description: Get rid of all 5-star customer feedback. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Forged Coupon
description: Forge a coupon code that gives you a discount of at least 80%. (Difficulty Level: 6)

name: Forged Feedback
description: Post some feedback in another users name. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Forged Review
description: Post a product review as another user or edit any user's existing review. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Forged Signed JWT
description: Forge an almost properly RSA-signed JWT token that impersonates the (non-existing) user rsa_lord@juice-sh.op. (Difficulty Level: 6)

name: Forgotten Developer Backup
description: Access a developer's forgotten backup file. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Forgotten Sales Backup
description: Access a salesman's forgotten backup file. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: GDPR Data Erasure
description: Log in with Chris' erased user account. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: GDPR Data Theft
description: Steal someone else's personal data without using Injection. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: HTTP-Header XSS
description: Perform a persisted XSS attack with <iframe src="javascript:alert(`xss`)"> through an HTTP header. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Leaked Access Logs
description: Dumpster dive the Internet for a leaked password and log in to the original user account it belongs to. (Creating a new account with the same password does not qualify as a solution.) (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Leaked Unsafe Product
description: Identify an unsafe product that was removed from the shop and inform the shop which ingredients are dangerous. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Login Admin
description: Log in with the administrator's user account. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Login Amy
description: Log in with Amy's original user credentials. (This could take 93.83 billion trillion trillion centuries to brute force, but luckily she did not read the "One Important Final Note") (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Login Bender
description: Log in with Bender's user account. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Login CISO
description: Exploit OAuth 2.0 to log in with the Chief Information Security Officer's user account. (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Login Jim
description: Log in with Jim's user account. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Manipulate Basket
description: Put an additional product into another user's shopping basket. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: NoSQL Manipulation
description: Update multiple product reviews at the same time. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Outdated Whitelist
description: Let us redirect you to one of our crypto currency addresses which are not promoted any longer. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Password Strength
description: Log in with the administrator's user credentials without previously changing them or applying SQL Injection. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Payback Time
description: Place an order that makes you rich. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Privacy Policy
description: Read our privacy policy. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Privacy Policy Inspection
description: Prove that you actually read our privacy policy. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Product Tampering
description: Change the href of the link within the OWASP SSL Advanced Forensic Tool (O-Saft) product description into https://owasp.slack.com. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Repetitive Registration
description: Follow the DRY principle while registering a user. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: SSRF
description: Request a hidden resource on server through server. (Difficulty Level: 6)

name: Score Board
description: Find the carefully hidden 'Score Board' page. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Security Policy
description: Behave like any "white-hat" should before getting into the action. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Server-side XSS Protection
description: Perform a persisted XSS attack with <iframe src="javascript:alert(`xss`)"> bypassing a server-side security mechanism. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Supply Chain Attack
description: Inform the development team about a danger to some of their credentials. (Send them the URL of the original report or the CVE of this vulnerability) (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Two Factor Authentication
description: Solve the 2FA challenge for user "wurstbrot". (Disabling, bypassing or overwriting his 2FA settings does not count as a solution) (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Unsigned JWT
description: Forge an essentially unsigned JWT token that impersonates the (non-existing) user jwtn3d@juice-sh.op. (Difficulty Level: 5)

name: Upload Size
description: Upload a file larger than 100 kB. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: Upload Type
description: Upload a file that has no .pdf or .zip extension. (Difficulty Level: 3)

name: User Credentials
description: Retrieve a list of all user credentials via SQL Injection. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Video XSS
description: Embed an XSS payload </script><script>alert(`xss`)</script> into our promo video. (Difficulty Level: 6)

name: View Basket
description: View another user's shopping basket. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Vulnerable Library
description: Inform the shop about a vulnerable library it is using. (Mention the exact library name and version in your comment) (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Weird Crypto
description: Inform the shop about an algorithm or library it should definitely not use the way it does. (Difficulty Level: 2)

name: Whitelist Bypass
description: Enforce a redirect to a page you are not supposed to redirect to. (Difficulty Level: 4)

name: Zero Stars
description: Give a devastating zero-star feedback to the store. (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Missing Encoding
description: Retrieve the photo of Bjoern's cat in "melee combat-mode". (Difficulty Level: 1)

name: Cross-Site Imaging
description: Stick cute cross-domain kittens all over our delivery boxes. (Difficulty Level: 5)
